text: It is time to speak the language of truth . Either the absence of democracy in Africa is no longer any more of a problem for Europe than the lack of development , or it is time to get serious about " good governance " as a condition for aid . Either the New Partnership for African Development ( Nepad ) is merely to entertain the international gallery during the occasional conference on " sustainable development " or Africa must itself impose a minimum of probity and respect for fundamental liberties . It has the means . Robert Mugabe remains in power thanks to the maize , oil , and electricity he supplies to South Africa . In Zimbabwe it is better to have an end to the torment than torment without end .
